metadata.title: CVE-2022-28893 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The SUNRPC subsystem in the Linux kernel through 5.17.2 can callxs_xprt_free before ensuring that sockets are in the intended state.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
